headline: Micron's $2.17 Billion Investment Boosts U.S. Chip Production in Manassas
summary: Semiconductor Giant Micron to Add 340 Jobs with Massive Manassas Facility Upgrade

headline: Micron to invest $2.17bn to expand semiconductor facility in Virginia, US
summary: The expansion aims to modernise the existing facility to produce state-of-the-present DRAM memories.

raw.headline: Micron to invest $2.17bn to expand semiconductor facility in Virginia, US
raw.summary: The expansion aims to modernise the existing facility to produce state-of-the-present DRAM memories.

headline: This Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock Could Be the Biggest Bargain Buy of 2025
summary: The early 2024 enthusiasm for Micron Technology (NASDAQ: MU) had some real truth to it.  Micron makes both DRAM memory and NAND flash storage, but DRAM makes up the majority of its revenue, at 73%.  With the rise of artificial intelligence, there is sudden demand for a new type of advanced memory, called high-bandwidth memory, or HBM.
